Class Connector

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

    James A. Donnell Jr.

        Creates a database connection.
        Parameters:
        table - Database table to create connection on.

        password - Database password.

        Connection
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Error if issues with connection.
